topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54f7720563687234d38f0100#post_54f7720563687234d38f0100
Alright, fine then. Your opinion...I guess.
But I still don't like hearing bad things about my folks, even if it's all in jest. Especially on the internet, where it's hard to tell from someone's comments if they're being serious or silly. Let's just stop this before things get out of hand, and move on. The last thing we need right now is getting into a pointless heated argument over nothing.

Internet shake on it?
!http://www.stevennoble.com/main.php?g2_view=core.DownloadItem&g2_itemId=4165&g2_serialNumber=3!

"@EHAN":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54f7726a63687234d3b30100#post_54f7726a63687234d3b30100
I'm always looking out for you, even (not so) far away at college. 
Have fun and be safe, for yours and my sake!
